short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome 2 Code lets you select DOM elements and find their definitions in the source code of your web application in VS Code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome to Code (C2C) allows you to communicate VSCode with Google Chrome browser while developing web applications.

Currently, its main feature is quite useful, especially when you are new to an existing project, or when you are working on legacy projects and you don't remember much about what they were about.

You will also need to install the code2chrome extension in VS Code.
